OCaml Labs

These are software packages developed and maintained at OCaml Labs, either directly by us or with our industrial collaborators at Citrix, Jane Street, OCamlPro, and of course with a huge amount of help from the wider OCaml community.

libvirt

  • version 0.6.1.2
Tags org:mirage and org:xapi-project
Maintainer dave.scott@eu.citrix.com
Dependencies ocamlfind
Last update Dec 19, 2013
Source http://libvirt.org/sources/ocaml/ocaml-libvirt-0.6.1.2.tar.gz
e6eb1943b2d0805566d691211bd0c151

Libvirt is a portable toolkit to interact with the virtualisation capabilities of Linux, Solaris and other operating systems.

From http://libvirt.org/ocaml/

Some things which you might want to do with ocaml-libvirt:

  • Monitor performance of virtual machines

  • Pause and resume virtual machines according to demand

  • Provision new virtual machines automatically for customers

  • Configure how virtual machines are networked together

Dependencies
ocamlfind
